## Introduction

[STUMPY](https://github.com/TDAmeritrade/stumpy) is a powerful and scalable Python library identifies repeating patterns in your timeseries. It does this by efficiently computing something called a [matrix profile](https://stumpy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/Tutorial_The_Matrix_Profile.html).

## App

This app runs entirely in the browser via [Pyodide](https://pyodide.org) and [panel convert](https://panel.holoviz.org/how_to/wasm/convert.html).
